org.crosswire.common.swing.desktop
类 ToolBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JToolBar
                  org.crosswire.common.swing.desktop.ToolBar
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class ToolBar
extends javax.swing.JToolBar

This toolbar allows for manipulating how it looks. That is it allows for:

  • showing/hiding labels
  • small/large icons
  • showing/hiding toolbar
It starts with large icons.

作者：
DM Smith [ dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors., 序列化表格

Show or hide the tool bar.

参数：
show - indicates whether the toolbar is visible

showText

public void showText(boolean show)
Set the tool tip text for the buttons on the tool bar.

参数：
show - indicates whether the buttons should be labeled

参数：
